headline: Should HSBC’s Upgrade and Predictive Betting Platform Partnership Prompt Action From Flutter (FLUT) Investors?
summary: In recent days, HSBC upgraded Flutter Entertainment from Hold to Buy and the company announced the late-2025 launch of a predictive sports betting platform in partnership with CME Group, as well as a change in voting rights involving Parvus Asset Management acquiring over 5% of voting rights. This series of announcements has drawn wider attention to Flutter's sector leadership and highlighted differing views among analysts about the company’s future prospects. We'll explore how Flutter's...
